title: Bloomberg Law Brief: Obama Legacy Undone at DOJ (Audio)
itunes:title: Bloomberg Law Brief: Obama Legacy Undone at DOJ (Audio)
description:
Tom Schoenberg, a legal reporter for Bloomberg News, discusses how attorney general Jeff Sessions has begun dismantling President Obama's legacy at the U.S. Justice Department. He speaks with Greg Stohr and June Grasso on Bloomberg Radio's "Bloomberg Law."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
